Outline: True story of Heinrich Harrer, an Austrian mountain climber who became friends with the Dalai Lama at the time of China's takeover of Tibet.

Name: Get the Gringo
Credit: Dir: Adrian Grunberg With: Mel Gibson, Kevin Hernandez, Daniel GimÃ©nez Cacho
Outline: A career criminal nabbed by Mexican authorities is placed in a tough prison where he learns to survive with the help of a young boy.

Name: Fallen
Genre: Action | Crime | Drama | Fantasy | Mystery | Thriller
Credit: Dir: Gregory Hoblit With: Denzel Washington, John Goodman, Donald Sutherland
Outline: Homicide detective John Hobbes witnesses the execution of serial killer Edgar Reese. Soon after the execution the killings start again, and they are very similar to Reese's style.

Name: Legend
Credit: Dir: Brian Helgeland With: Tom Hardy, Emily Browning, Taron Egerton
Outline: The film tells the story of the identical twin gangsters Reggie and Ronnie Kray, two of the most notorious criminals in British history, and their organised crime empire in the East End of London during the 1960s.

Name: Trollhunter
Credit: Dir: AndrÃ© Ãvredal With: Otto Jespersen, Robert Stoltenberg, Knut NÃ¦rum
Outline: A group of students investigates a series of mysterious bear killings, but learns that there are much more dangerous things going on. They start to follow a mysterious hunter, learning that he is actually a troll hunter.

Name: Julie & Julia
Credit: Dir: Nora Ephron With: Amy Adams, Meryl Streep, Chris Messina
Outline: Julia Child's story of her start in the cooking profession is intertwined with blogger Julie Powell's 2002 challenge to cook all the recipes in Child's first book.

Name: Another Earth
Credit: Dir: Mike Cahill With: Brit Marling, William Mapother, Matthew-Lee Erlbach
Outline: On the night of the discovery of a duplicate Earth in the Solar system, an ambitious young student and an accomplished composer cross paths in a tragic accident.

Name: Gomorrah
Credit: Dir: Matteo Garrone With: Gianfelice Imparato, Salvatore Abbruzzese, Toni Servillo
Outline: An inside look at Italy's modern crime families.

Name: The Cooler
Credit: Dir: Wayne Kramer With: William H. Macy, Maria Bello, Alec Baldwin
Outline: In an old school Las Vegas casino, its top gambling jinx breaks his curse when he falls in love, much to his boss' consternation.

Name: Nymphomaniac: Vol. I
Credit: Dir: Lars von Trier With: Charlotte Gainsbourg, Stellan SkarsgÃ¥rd, Stacy Martin
Outline: A self-diagnosed nymphomaniac recounts her erotic experiences to the man who saved her after a beating.

Name: Buried
Credit: Dir: Rodrigo CortÃ©s With: Ryan Reynolds, JosÃ© Luis GarcÃ­a PÃ©rez, Robert Paterson
Outline: Paul is a U.S. truck driver working in Iraq. After an attack by a group of Iraqis he wakes to find he is buried alive inside a coffin. With only a lighter and a cell phone it's a race against time to escape this claustrophobic death trap.

Name: Boiler Room
Credit: Dir: Ben Younger With: Giovanni Ribisi, Vin Diesel, Nia Long
Outline: A college dropout gets a job as a broker for a suburban investment firm, which puts him on the fast track to success, but the job might not be as legitimate as it sounds.

Name: Public Enemies
Credit: Dir: Michael Mann With: Christian Bale, Johnny Depp, David Wenham
Outline: The Feds try to take down notorious American gangsters John Dillinger, Baby Face Nelson and Pretty Boy Floyd during a booming crime wave in the 1930s.

Name: Cinderella

Name: Ghost

Name: What Dreams May Come
Credit: Dir: Vincent Ward With: Robin Williams, Cuba Gooding Jr., Annabella Sciorra
Outline: After he dies in a car crash, a man searches heaven and hell for his beloved wife.

Name: 8 Mile
Credit: Dir: Curtis Hanson With: Eminem, Brittany Murphy, Kim Basinger
Outline: A young rapper, struggling with every aspect of his life, wants to make it big but his friends and foes make this odyssey of rap, harder than it may seem.

Name: One Day

Name: Black Mass

Name: My Week with Marilyn

Outline: Colin Clark, an employee of Sir Laurence Olivier 's, documents the tense interaction between Olivier and Marilyn Monroe during the production of The Prince and the Showgirl .

Name: The Prince of Egypt
Genre: Animation | Adventure | Biography | Drama | Family | Fantasy | Musical
Credit: Dir: Brenda Chapman, Steve Hickner With: Val Kilmer, Ralph Fiennes, Michelle Pfeiffer
Outline: An Egyptian prince learns of his identity as a Hebrew and, later his destiny to become the chosen deliverer of his people.

Name: Scrooged
Credit: Dir: Richard Donner With: Bill Murray, Karen Allen, John Forsythe
Outline: A selfish, cynical T.V. executive is haunted by three spirits bearing lessons on Christmas Eve.

Name: Ever After: A Cinderella Story
Credit: Dir: Andy Tennant With: Drew Barrymore, Anjelica Huston, Dougray Scott
Outline: The "real" story of Cinderella. A refreshing new take on the classic fairy tale.

Name: The X Files
Credit: Dir: Rob Bowman With: David Duchovny, Gillian Anderson, John Neville
Outline: Mulder and Scully must fight the government in a conspiracy and find the truth about an alien colonization of Earth.

Name: Inland Empire
Credit: Dir: David Lynch With: Laura Dern, Jeremy Irons, Justin Theroux
Outline: As an actress starts to adopt the persona of her character in a film, her world starts to become nightmarish and surreal.

Name: Velvet Goldmine

Name: Syriana
Credit: Dir: Stephen Gaghan With: George Clooney, Matt Damon, Amanda Peet
Outline: A politically-charged epic about the state of the oil industry in the hands of those personally involved and affected by it.

Name: Frank

Outline: Jon, a young wanna-be musician, discovers he's bitten off more than he can chew when he joins an eccentric pop band led by the mysterious and enigmatic Frank.

Name: I'm Not There.
Credit: Dir: Todd Haynes With: Christian Bale, Cate Blanchett, Heath Ledger
Outline: Ruminations on the life of Bob Dylan, where six characters embody a different aspect of the musician's life and work.

Name: Camp X-Ray
Credit: Dir: Peter Sattler With: Kristen Stewart, Peyman Moaadi, Lane Garrison
Outline: A soldier assigned to Guantanamo Bay befriends a man who has been imprisoned there.

Name: Parenthood

Name: An Officer and a Gentleman

Outline: A young man must complete his work at a Navy Flight school to become an aviator, with the help of a tough gunnery sergeant and his new girlfriend.

Name: In the Heart of the Sea
Genre: Action | Adventure | Biography | Drama | History | Thriller
Credit: Dir: Ron Howard With: Chris Hemsworth, Cillian Murphy, Brendan Gleeson
Outline: A recounting of a New England whaling ship's sinking by a giant whale in 1820, an experience that later inspired the great novel Moby-Dick.

Name: The First Time
Credit: Dir: Jon Kasdan With: Dylan O'Brien, Britt Robertson, Victoria Justice
Outline: A shy senior and a down-to-earth junior fall in love over the weekend.

Name: Ladyhawke
Credit: Dir: Richard Donner With: Matthew Broderick, Rutger Hauer, Michelle Pfeiffer

Name: Starman

Outline: An alien takes the form of a young widow's husband and asks her to drive him from Wisconsin to Arizona. The government tries to stop them.

Name: Trust
Credit: Dir: David Schwimmer With: Clive Owen, Catherine Keener, Liana Liberato
Outline: A teenage girl is targeted by an online sexual predator.

Name: The Color of Money
Credit: Dir: Martin Scorsese With: Paul Newman, Tom Cruise, Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio
Outline: Fast Eddie Felson teaches a cocky but immensely talented protÃ©gÃ© the ropes of pool hustling, which in turn inspires him to make an unlikely comeback.

Name: Primer
Credit: Dir: Shane Carruth With: Shane Carruth, David Sullivan, Casey Gooden
Outline: Four friends/fledgling entrepreneurs, knowing that there's something bigger and more innovative than the different error-checking devices they've built, wrestle over their new invention.

Name: Girl with a Pearl Earring

Name: Big Eyes

Name: Kill the Messenger
Credit: Dir: Michael Cuesta With: Jeremy Renner, Robert Patrick, Jena Sims
Outline: Based on the True story of Journalist Gary Webb. The film takes place in the mid 1990s, when Webb uncovered...

Name: Harsh Times
Credit: Dir: David Ayer With: Christian Bale, Eva Longoria, Freddy RodrÃ­guez
Outline: A tough-minded drama about two friends in South Central Los Angeles and the violence that comes between them.

Name: Trance
Credit: Dir: Danny Boyle With: James McAvoy, Rosario Dawson, Vincent Cassel
Outline: An art auctioneer who has become mixed up with a group of criminals partners with a hypnotherapist in order to recover a lost painting.

Name: Mr. Holmes
Credit: Dir: Bill Condon With: Ian McKellen, Laura Linney, Hiroyuki Sanada
Outline: An aged, retired Sherlock Holmes deals with early dementia as he tries to remember both his final case and a mysterious woman whose memory haunts him. He also befriends a fan, the young son of his housekeeper, who wants him to work again.

Name: The Rookie
Credit: Dir: John Lee Hancock With: Dennis Quaid, J.D. Evermore, Rachel Griffiths

Name: Hector and the Search for Happiness
Credit: Dir: Peter Chelsom With: Simon Pegg, Rosamund Pike, Tracy Ann Oberman
Outline: A psychiatrist searches the globe to find the secret of happiness.

Name: World's Greatest Dad

Outline: A British investment broker inherits his uncle's chateau and vineyard in Provence, where he spent much of his childhood. He discovers a new laid-back lifestyle as he tries to renovate the estate to be sold.

Credit: Dir: Francis Lawrence With: Robert Pattinson, Reese Witherspoon, Christoph Waltz
Outline: Set in the 1930s, a former veterinary student takes a job in a traveling circus and falls in love with the ringmaster's wife.

Outline: Haunted by painful memories and increasing paranoia, a damaged woman struggles to re-assimilate with her family after fleeing an abusive cult.

Name: Grumpy Old Men

Outline: A lifelong feud between two neighbors since childhood only gets worse when a new female neighbor moves across the street.

Name: Labor Day

Name: Cop Land

Name: He Got Game

Name: Constantine

Name: Extremely Loud & Incredibly Close

Name: Gridiron Gang

Name: The Air I Breathe

A businessman bets his life on a horse race; a gangster sees the future; a pop star falls prey to a crime boss; a doctor must save the love of his life.

Name: Radio

Name: Anonymous

Name: Basic Instinct

Name: Alpha Dog

Name: Joe

Name: Clear and Present Danger

Name: The Edge

Name: 48 Hrs.

Name: Lolita

Name: Shadow of the Vampire

Name: The Duchess

Name: Che: Part Two

Name: The Majestic

Name: Homeward Bound: The Incredible Journey

Name: The Towering Inferno

Name: Fatal Attraction

Name: Breakdown

Name: Mrs. Doubtfire

Name: All Is Lost

Name: Disturbia

Name: We Own the Night
Credit: Dir: James Gray With: Joaquin Phoenix, Mark Wahlberg, Eva Mendes

Name: The Hunchback of Notre Dame

Name: The Rescuers Down Under

Credit: Dir: Hendel Butoy, Mike Gabriel With: Bob Newhart, Eva Gabor, John Candy
Outline: The R.A.S. agents, Miss Bianca and Bernard, race to Australia to save a boy and a rare golden eagle from a murderous poacher.

Name: Hearts in Atlantis

Name: The Iceman

Name: Stay

Name: Enemy Mine

Name: The East
Credit: Dir: Zal Batmanglij With: Brit Marling, Alexander SkarsgÃ¥rd, Ellen Page

Name: Cruel Intentions

Name: Great Expectations

Name: Spider

Name: The Pledge

Name: Stoker

Name: The Skeleton Twins

Name: The Guardian

Name: The Score
Credit: Dir: Frank Oz With: Robert De Niro, Edward Norton, Marlon Brando
Outline: An aging thief hopes to retire and live off his ill-gotten wealth when a young kid convinces him into doing one last heist.

Name: 2 Days in Paris
Credit: Dir: Julie Delpy With: Julie Delpy, Adam Goldberg, Daniel BrÃ¼hl

Name: Private Parts
Credit: Dir: Betty Thomas With: Howard Stern, Mary McCormack, Robin Quivers
Outline: The autobiographical story of Howard Stern, the radio rebel who is now also a TV personality, an author and a movie star.

Name: Happythankyoumoreplease
Credit: Dir: Josh Radnor With: Josh Radnor, Malin Akerman, Zoe Kazan
Outline: Captures a generational moment - young people on the cusp of truly growing up, tiring of their reflexive cynicism, each in their own ways struggling to connect and define what it means to love and be loved.

Name: Defendor

Outline: Arthur Poppington, a regular man who adopts a superhero persona, known as 'Defendor', combs the city streets at night, in search of his arch-enemy, Captain Industry.

Name: Bad Boys
Credit: Dir: Michael Bay With: Will Smith, Martin Lawrence, Lisa Boyle
Outline: Two hip detectives protect a murder witness while investigating a case of stolen heroin.

Name: Bringing Out the Dead

Outline: Haunted by the patients he failed to save, an extremely burned-out Manhattan ambulance paramedic fights to maintain his sanity over three fraught and turbulent nights.

Name: The Vow

Outline: A car accident puts Paige in a coma, and when she wakes up with severe memory loss, her husband Leo works to win her heart again.

Name: Any Given Sunday
Credit: Dir: Oliver Stone With: Al Pacino, Dennis Quaid, Cameron Diaz
Outline: A behind-the-scenes look at the life-and-death struggles of modern-day gladiators and those who lead them.

Name: Babe
Credit: Dir: Chris Noonan With: James Cromwell, Magda Szubanski, Christine Cavanaugh
Outline: Babe, a pig raised by sheepdogs, learns to herd sheep with a little help from Farmer Hoggett.

Name: The Crucible
Credit: Dir: Nicholas Hytner With: Daniel Day-Lewis, Winona Ryder, Paul Scofield
Outline: A Salem resident attempts to frame her ex-lover's wife for being a witch in the middle of the 1692 witchcraft trials.

Name: Romper Stomper
Credit: Dir: Geoffrey Wright With: Russell Crowe, Daniel Pollock, Jacqueline McKenzie
Outline: A group of skinheads become alarmed at the way their neighbourhood is changing.

Name: Salmon Fishing in the Yemen
Credit: Dir: Lasse HallstrÃ¶m With: Ewan McGregor, Emily Blunt, Amr Waked
Outline: A fisheries expert is approached by a consultant to help realize a sheik's vision of bringing the sport of fly-fishing to the desert and embarks on an upstream journey of faith and fish to prove the impossible possible.

Name: Rendition
Credit: Dir: Gavin Hood With: Reese Witherspoon, Jake Gyllenhaal, Peter Sarsgaard
Outline: A CIA analyst questions his assignment after witnessing an unorthodox interrogation at a secret detention facility outside the US.

Name: The Devil Wears Prada

Outline: A smart but sensible new graduate lands a job as an assistant to Miranda Priestly, the demanding editor-in-chief of a high fashion magazine.

Name: Machine Gun Preacher

Name: Trouble with the Curve

Outline: A daughter tries to remedy her dysfunctional relationship with her ailing father, a decorated baseball scout by helping him in a recruiting trip which could be his last.

Name: Ginger Snaps

Outline: Two death-obsessed sisters, outcasts in their suburban neighborhood, must deal with the tragic consequences when one of them is bitten by a deadly werewolf.

Name: Romeo + Juliet
Credit: Dir: Baz Luhrmann With: Leonardo DiCaprio, Claire Danes, John Leguizamo
Outline: Shakespeare's famous play is updated to the hip modern suburb of Verona still retaining its original dialogue.

Name: Young Guns

Name: Street Kings

Credit: Dir: Robert Luketic With: Jim Sturgess, Kate Bosworth, Kevin Spacey

Name: Fair Game

Outline: CIA operative Valerie Plame discovers her identity is allegedly leaked by the government as payback for an op-ed article her husband wrote criticizing the Bush administration.

Name: The Matador

Outline: A globetrotting hitman and a crestfallen businessman meet in a hotel bar in Mexico City in an encounter that draws them together in a way neither expected.

Name: The Brave One

Outline: A woman struggles to recover from a brutal attack by setting out on a mission for revenge.

Name: The Ghost and the Darkness

Name: A Most Wanted Man
Credit: Dir: Anton Corbijn With: Philip Seymour Hoffman, Rachel McAdams, Daniel BrÃ¼hl
Outline: A Chechen Muslim illegally immigrates to Hamburg, where he gets caught in the international war on terror.

Name: Hanna
Credit: Dir: Joe Wright With: Saoirse Ronan, Cate Blanchett, Eric Bana
Outline: A sixteen-year-old girl who was raised by her father to be the perfect assassin is dispatched on a mission across Europe, tracked by a ruthless intelligence agent and her operatives.

Name: Veronica Mars

Name: Bicentennial Man

Outline: An android endeavors to become human as he gradually acquires emotions.

Name: The American President

Name: My Girl

Outline: A young girl, on the threshold of her teen years, finds her life turning upside down, when she is accompanied by an unlikely friend.

Name: Draft Day

Name: Spun
Credit: Dir: Jonas Ãkerlund With: Jason Schwartzman, John Leguizamo, Patrick Fugit
Outline: A drug dealer introduces one of his customers, a 'speed freak', to the man who runs the meth lab. A crazy three-day adventure ensues.

Name: If I Stay
Credit: Dir: R.J. Cutler With: ChloÃ« Grace Moretz, Mireille Enos, Jamie Blackley
Outline: Life changes in an instant for young Mia Hall after a car accident puts her in a coma. During an out-of-body experience, she must decide whether to wake up and live a life far different than she had imagined. The choice is hers if she can go on.

Name: A Christmas Carol

Name: The Firm

Complicating matters are one of her father's ex-students, who wants to search through his papers, and her estranged sister, who shows up to help settle his affairs.

Name: Dan in Real Life

Name: Sea of Love

Name: 2 Guns

Name: Life

Name: Blindness

Name: Wasabi
Credit: Dir: GÃ©rard Krawczyk With: Jean Reno, RyÃ´ko Hirosue, Michel Muller
Outline: Hubert is a French policeman with very sharp methods. After being forced to take 2 months off by his boss...

Name: The Weather Man

Outline: Two friends, a priest and a rabbi, fall in love with the same woman they knew in their youth, but the religious position of both men denies them romance.

Name: Air Force One
Credit: Dir: Wolfgang Petersen With: Harrison Ford, Gary Oldman, Glenn Close
Outline: Hijackers seize the plane carrying the President of the United States and his family, but he - an ex-soldier - works from hiding to defeat them.

Name: Our Idiot Brother
Credit: Dir: Jesse Peretz With: Paul Rudd, Elizabeth Banks, Zooey Deschanel
Outline: A comedy centered on an idealist who barges into the lives of his three sisters.

Name: The Nines
Credit: Dir: John August With: Ryan Reynolds, Hope Davis, Melissa McCarthy
Outline: A troubled actor, a television show runner, and an acclaimed videogame designer find their lives intertwining in mysterious and unsettling ways.

Name: The Mighty Ducks
Credit: Dir: Stephen Herek With: Emilio Estevez, Joss Ackland, Lane Smith
Outline: A self-centered lawyer is sentenced to community service coaching a rag tag youth hockey team.

Name: Varsity Blues
Credit: Dir: Brian Robbins With: James Van Der Beek, Jon Voight, Paul Walker
Outline: A back-up quarterback is chosen to lead a Texas football team to victory after the star quarterback is injured.

Name: Marie Antoinette
Credit: Dir: Sofia Coppola With: Kirsten Dunst, Jason Schwartzman, Rip Torn

Name: Click

Name: The Rover
Credit: Dir: David MichÃ´d With: Guy Pearce, Robert Pattinson, Scoot McNairy
Outline: 10 years after a global economic collapse, a hardened loner pursues the men who stole his only possession, his car. Along the way, he captures one of the thieves' brother, and the duo form an uneasy bond during the dangerous journey.

Name: Mona Lisa Smile
Credit: Dir: Mike Newell With: Julia Roberts, Kirsten Dunst, Julia Stiles
Outline: A free-thinking art professor teaches conservative 1950s Wellesley girls to question their traditional social roles.

Name: Paper Towns
Credit: Dir: Jake Schreier With: Nat Wolff, Cara Delevingne, Austin Abrams
Outline: After an all night adventure, Quentin's life-long crush, Margo, disappears, leaving behind clues that Quentin and his friends follow on the journey of a lifetime.

Name: Behind Enemy Lines
Credit: Dir: John Moore With: Gene Hackman, Owen Wilson, Gabriel Macht
Outline: A Navy navigator is shot down over enemy territory and is ruthlessly pursued by a secret police enforcer and the opposing troops. Meanwhile his commanding officer goes against orders in an attempt to rescue him.

Name: The Messenger: The Story of Joan of Arc
Credit: Dir: Luc Besson With: Milla Jovovich, John Malkovich, Rab Affleck

Name: The Parent Trap
Credit: Dir: Nancy Meyers With: Lindsay Lohan, Dennis Quaid, Natasha Richardson
Outline: Identical twins, separated at birth and each raised by one of their biological parents, discover each other for the first time at summer camp and make a plan to bring their wayward parents back together.

Name: Black Death
Genre: Action | Adventure | Drama | History | Horror | Mystery
Credit: Dir: Christopher Smith With: Eddie Redmayne, Sean Bean, Carice van Houten
Outline: Set during the time of the first outbreak of bubonic plague in England, a young monk is given the task of learning the truth about reports of people being brought back to life in a small village.

Name: Monsters
Credit: Dir: Gareth Edwards With: Scoot McNairy, Whitney Able, Mario Zuniga Benavides
Outline: Six years after Earth has suffered an alien invasion a cynical journalist agrees to escort a shaken American tourist through an infected zone in Mexico to the safety of the US border.

Name: The Company You Keep
Credit: Dir: Robert Redford With: Robert Redford, Brit Marling, Stanley Tucci
Outline: A former Weather Underground activist goes on the run from a journalist who has discovered his identity.

Name: Big Daddy
Credit: Dir: Dennis Dugan With: Adam Sandler, Joey Lauren Adams, Jon Stewart
Outline: A lazy law school grad adopts a kid to impress his girlfriend, but everything doesn't go as planned and he becomes the unlikely foster father.

Name: Elizabethtown
Credit: Dir: Cameron Crowe With: Orlando Bloom, Kirsten Dunst, Susan Sarandon
Outline: During an outrageous memorial for a Southern patriarch, an unexpected romance blooms between a young woman and man.

Name: Blood Work
Credit: Dir: Clint Eastwood With: Clint Eastwood, Jeff Daniels, Anjelica Huston
Outline: Still recovering from a heart transplant, a retired FBI profiler returns to service when his own blood analysis offers clues to the identity of a serial killer.

Name: The Sum of All Fears
Credit: Dir: Phil Alden Robinson With: Ben Affleck, Morgan Freeman, Ian Mongrain
Outline: CIA analyst Jack Ryan must thwart the plans of a terrorist faction that threatens to induce a catastrophic conflict between the United States and Russia's newly elected president by detonating a nuclear weapon at a football game in Baltimore.

Name: Phenomenon

Name: Mary Shelley's Frankenstein

Name: Delivery Man

Name: Upside Down

Name: He's Just Not That Into You

Name: Death to Smoochy

Name: Last Man Standing
Credit: Dir: Walter Hill With: Bruce Willis, Bruce Dern, William Sanderson

Name: The Frozen Ground

Name: Colombiana
Credit: Dir: Olivier Megaton With: Zoe Saldana, Michael Vartan, Callum Blue
Outline: A young woman, after witnessing her parents' murder as a child in Bogota, grows up to be a stone-cold assassin.

Name: White House Down
Credit: Dir: Roland Emmerich With: Channing Tatum, Jamie Foxx, Maggie Gyllenhaal
Outline: While on a tour of the White House with his young daughter, a Capitol policeman springs into action to save his child and protect the president from a heavily armed group of paramilitary invaders.

Name: Centurion
Genre: Action | Adventure | Drama | History | Thriller | War
Credit: Dir: Neil Marshall With: Michael Fassbender, Dominic West, Olga Kurylenko
Outline: A splinter group of Roman soldiers fight for their lives behind enemy lines after their legion is decimated in a devastating guerrilla attack.

Name: The Perfect Storm
Credit: Dir: Wolfgang Petersen With: George Clooney, Mark Wahlberg, Diane Lane

Name: Dangerous Minds
Credit: Dir: John N. Smith With: Michelle Pfeiffer, George Dzundza, Courtney B. Vance

Name: The Libertine
Credit: Dir: Laurence Dunmore With: Johnny Depp, Samantha Morton, John Malkovich

Name: Burlesque
Credit: Dir: Steve Antin With: Cher, Christina Aguilera, Alan Cumming
Outline: A small-town girl ventures to Los Angeles and finds her place in a neo-burlesque club run by a former dancer.

Name: Funny People
Credit: Dir: Judd Apatow With: Adam Sandler, Seth Rogen, Leslie Mann

Name: W.
Credit: Dir: Oliver Stone With: Josh Brolin, Elizabeth Banks, Ioan Gruffudd
Outline: A chronicle of the life and presidency of George W. Bush .

Name: 17 Again
Credit: Dir: Burr Steers With: Zac Efron, Matthew Perry, Leslie Mann

Name: The Uninvited

Name: Crash

Name: The Losers
Credit: Dir: Sylvain White With: Idris Elba, Zoe Saldana, Jeffrey Dean Morgan
Outline: A CIA special forces team are betrayed and left for dead by their superiors, galvanizing them to mount an offensive on the CIA.

Name: The Santa Clause
Credit: Dir: John Pasquin With: Tim Allen, Judge Reinhold, Wendy Crewson
Outline: When a man inadvertantly kills Santa on Christmas Eve, he finds himself magically recruited to take his place.

Name: Rules of Engagement
Credit: Dir: William Friedkin With: Tommy Lee Jones, Samuel L. Jackson, Guy Pearce
Outline: An attorney defends an officer on trial for ordering his troops to fire on civilians after they stormed a U.S. embassy in a third world country.

Name: The Good Son

Name: Somewhere

Name: Red Dawn

Name: Take Me Home Tonight

Outline: Four years after graduation, an awkward high school genius uses his sister's boyfriend's Labor Day party as the perfect opportunity to make his move on his high school crush.

Name: Hope Springs
Credit: Dir: David Frankel With: Meryl Streep, Tommy Lee Jones, Steve Carell
Outline: After thirty years of marriage, a middle-aged couple attends an intense, week-long counseling session to work on their relationship.

Name: St. Elmo's Fire
Credit: Dir: Joel Schumacher With: Demi Moore, Rob Lowe, Andrew McCarthy
Outline: A group of friends, just out of college, struggle with adulthood.

Name: While We're Young
Credit: Dir: Noah Baumbach With: Ben Stiller, Naomi Watts, Adam Driver
Outline: A middle-aged couple's career and marriage are overturned when a disarming young couple enters their lives.

Name: Chloe
Credit: Dir: Atom Egoyan With: Julianne Moore, Amanda Seyfried, Liam Neeson
Outline: A doctor hires an escort to seduce her husband, whom she suspects of cheating, though unforeseen events put the family in danger.

Name: Peggy Sue Got Married
Credit: Dir: Francis Ford Coppola With: Kathleen Turner, Nicolas Cage, Barry Miller
Outline: Peggy Sue faints at a high school reunion. When she wakes up, she finds herself in her own past, just before she finished school.

Name: Lock Up
Credit: Dir: John Flynn With: Sylvester Stallone, Donald Sutherland, John Amos
Outline: With only 6 months left of his prison sentence inmate Frank Leone is transferred from minimum security to maximum security by a vindictive warden.

Name: High Crimes
Credit: Dir: Carl Franklin With: Jim Caviezel, Morgan Freeman, Ashley Judd
Outline: High powered lawyer Claire Kubik finds her world turned upside down when her husband, who she thought was Tom Kubik...

Name: Hitman
Credit: Dir: Xavier Gens With: Timothy Olyphant, Dougray Scott, Olga Kurylenko

Name: Nick of Time
Credit: Dir: John Badham With: Johnny Depp, Christopher Walken, Courtney Chase
Outline: An unimpressive, every-day man is forced into a situation where he is told to kill a politician to save his kidnapped daughter.

Name: Dear John
Credit: Dir: Lasse HallstrÃ¶m With: Channing Tatum, Amanda Seyfried, Richard Jenkins
Outline: A romantic drama about a soldier who falls for a conservative college student while he's home on leave.

Name: It Could Happen to You
Credit: Dir: Andrew Bergman With: Nicolas Cage, Bridget Fonda, Rosie Perez
Outline: A police officer promises to share his lottery ticket with a waitress in lieu of a tip.

Name: Tin Cup
Credit: Dir: Ron Shelton With: Kevin Costner, Rene Russo, Don Johnson
Outline: A washed up golf pro working at a driving range tries to qualify for the US Open in order to win the heart of his succesful rival's girlfriend.

Name: New York, I Love You
Credit: Dir: Fatih Akin, Yvan Attal With: Shia LaBeouf, Natalie Portman, Bradley Cooper
Outline: Several love stories set in one of the most loved cities of the world, New York.

Name: Hart's War
Credit: Dir: Gregory Hoblit With: Bruce Willis, Colin Farrell, Terrence Howard
Outline: A law student becomes a lieutenant during World War II, is captured and asked to defend a black prisoner of war falsely accused of murder.

Name: Cyrus
Credit: Dir: Jay Duplass, Mark Duplass With: John C. Reilly, Marisa Tomei, Jonah Hill
Outline: John and Molly, a divorced middle aged man and a single mother meet at a friends party and start up a small relationship, all John has to do now is meet Molly's son... Cyrus

Name: Evita
Credit: Dir: Alan Parker With: Madonna, Jonathan Pryce, Antonio Banderas
Outline: The hit musical based on the life of Evita Duarte, a B-picture Argentinian actress who eventually became the wife of Argentinian president Juan PerÃ³n, and the most beloved and hated woman in Argentina.

Name: All Good Things
Credit: Dir: Andrew Jarecki With: Ryan Gosling, Kirsten Dunst, Frank Langella
Outline: Mr. David Marks was suspected but never tried for killing his wife Katie who disappeared in 1982, but the truth is eventually revealed.

Name: No Reservations
Credit: Dir: Scott Hicks With: Catherine Zeta-Jones, Aaron Eckhart, Abigail Breslin
Outline: The life of a top chef changes when she becomes the guardian of her young niece.

Name: The American
Credit: Dir: Anton Corbijn With: George Clooney, Paolo Bonacelli, Violante Placido
Outline: An assassin hides out in Italy for one last assignment.

Name: The Family Stone
Credit: Dir: Thomas Bezucha With: Dermot Mulroney, Sarah Jessica Parker, Claire Danes
Outline: An uptight, conservative, businesswoman accompanies her boyfriend to his eccentric and outgoing family's annual Christmas celebration and finds that she's a fish out of water in their free-spirited way of life.

Name: King Arthur
Credit: Dir: Antoine Fuqua With: Clive Owen, Stephen Dillane, Keira Knightley
Outline: A demystified take on the tale of King Arthur and the Knights of the Round Table.

Name: Young Adult
Credit: Dir: Jason Reitman With: Charlize Theron, Patrick Wilson, Patton Oswalt
Outline: Soon after her divorce, a fiction writer returns to her home in small-town Minnesota, looking to rekindle a romance with her ex-boyfriend, who is now happily married and has a newborn daughter.

Name: Before I Go to Sleep
Credit: Dir: Rowan Joffe With: Nicole Kidman, Colin Firth, Mark Strong
Outline: A woman wakes up every day, remembering nothing as a result of a traumatic accident in her past. One day, new terrifying truths emerge that force her to question everyone around her.

Name: Endless Love
Credit: Dir: Shana Feste With: Gabriella Wilde, Alex Pettyfer, Bruce Greenwood
Outline: The story of a privileged girl and a charismatic boy whose instant desire sparks a love affair made only more reckless by parents trying to keep them apart.

Name: The Human Stain

Name: You Will Meet a Tall Dark Stranger
Credit: Dir: Woody Allen With: Anthony Hopkins, Naomi Watts, Josh Brolin
Outline: Sally's parents' marriage breaks up when her father undergoes a mid-life crisis and impulsively weds a prostitute as Sally's own marriage also begins to disintegrate.

Name: Transcendence
Credit: Dir: Wally Pfister With: Johnny Depp, Rebecca Hall, Morgan Freeman
Outline: A scientist's drive for artificial intelligence, takes on dangerous implications when his consciousness is uploaded into one such program.

Name: Dorian Gray
Credit: Dir: Oliver Parker With: Ben Barnes, Colin Firth, Rebecca Hall
Outline: A corrupt young man somehow keeps his youthful beauty eternally, but a special painting gradually reveals his inner ugliness to all.

Name: Femme Fatale
Credit: Dir: Brian De Palma With: Rebecca Romijn, Antonio Banderas, Peter Coyote
Outline: A woman tries to straighten out her life, even as her past as a con-woman comes back to haunt her.

Name: Assault on Precinct 13
Credit: Dir: Jean-FranÃ§ois Richet With: Ethan Hawke, Laurence Fishburne, Gabriel Byrne
Outline: A police sergeant must rally the cops and prisoners together to protect themselves on New Year's Eve, just as corrupt policeman surround the station with the intent of killing all to keep their deception in the ranks.

Name: True Story

Outline: When disgraced New York Times reporter Michael Finkel meets accused killer Christian Longo - who has taken on Finkel's identity - his investigation morphs into a game of cat-and-mouse.

Name: Don't Say a Word
Credit: Dir: Gary Fleder With: Michael Douglas, Sean Bean, Brittany Murphy
Outline: When the daughter of a psychiatrist is kidnapped, he's horrified to discover that the abductors' demand is that he break through to a post traumatic stress disorder suffering young woman who knows a secret...

Name: Deadfall

Name: Twister

Name: Dracula Untold

Outline: As his kingdom is being threatened by the Turks, young prince Vlad Tepes must become a monster feared by his own people in order to obtain the power needed to protect his own family, and the families of his kingdom.

Name: After the Sunset
Credit: Dir: Brett Ratner With: Pierce Brosnan, Salma Hayek, Woody Harrelson
Outline: The story of what happens after a master thief achieves his last big score, when the FBI agent who promised he'd capture him is about to do just that.

Name: The Invisible
Credit: Dir: David S. Goyer With: Justin Chatwin, Margarita Levieva, Marcia Gay Harden
Outline: A teenager is left invisible to the living after an attack.

Name: Under the Skin
Credit: Dir: Jonathan Glazer With: Scarlett Johansson, Jeremy McWilliams, Lynsey Taylor Mackay
Outline: A mysterious woman seduces lonely men in the evening hours in Scotland. Events lead her to begin a process of self-discovery.

Name: Nurse Betty
Credit: Dir: Neil LaBute With: RenÃ©e Zellweger, Morgan Freeman, Chris Rock
Outline: Comedy about a widow's post-traumatic obsession with a soap star.

Name: 47 Ronin
Credit: Dir: Carl Rinsch With: Keanu Reeves, Hiroyuki Sanada, Ko Shibasaki
Outline: A band of samurai set out to avenge the death and dishonor of their master at the hands of a ruthless shogun.

Name: The General's Daughter
Credit: Dir: Simon West With: John Travolta, Madeleine Stowe, James Cromwell
Outline: When the daughter of a well-known and well-respected base commander is murdered, an undercover detective is summoned to look into the matter and finds a slew of cover-ups at West Point.

Name: Wall Street: Money Never Sleeps

Outline: Now out of prison but still disgraced by his peers, Gordon Gekko works his future son-in-law, an idealistic stock broker, when he sees an opportunity to take down a Wall Street enemy and rebuild his empire.

Name: 300: Rise of an Empire

Outline: Greek general Themistokles leads the charge against invading Persian forces led by mortal-turned-god Xerxes and Artemisia, vengeful commander of the Persian navy.

Name: London Boulevard

Outline: An ex-con with a reputation tries to go straight by working as a handy man for a reclusive actress but this is unfortunately not the wish of London's underground crime lord.

Name: Maps to the Stars
Credit: Dir: David Cronenberg With: Julianne Moore, Mia Wasikowska, Robert Pattinson
Outline: A tour into the heart of a Hollywood family chasing celebrity, one another and the relentless ghosts of their pasts.

Name: Sabrina
Credit: Dir: Sydney Pollack With: Harrison Ford, Julia Ormond, Greg Kinnear
Outline: An ugly duckling having undergone a remarkable change, still harbors feelings for her crush: a carefree playboy, but not before his business-focused brother has something to say about it.

Name: Prime
Credit: Dir: Ben Younger With: Uma Thurman, Meryl Streep, Bryan Greenberg
Outline: A career driven professional from Manhattan is wooed by a young painter, who also happens to be the son of her psychoanalyst.

Name: Red Lights
Credit: Dir: Rodrigo CortÃ©s With: Sigourney Weaver, Robert De Niro, Cillian Murphy
Outline: Psychologist Margaret Matheson and her assistant study paranormal activity, which leads them to investigate a world-renowned psychic who has resurfaced years after his toughest critic mysteriously passed away.

Name: Proof of Life
Credit: Dir: Taylor Hackford With: Meg Ryan, Russell Crowe, David Morse
Outline: Alice hires a professional negotiator to obtain the release of her engineer husband, who has been kidnapped by anti-government guerrillas in South America.

Name: Two for the Money
Credit: Dir: D.J. Caruso With: Matthew McConaughey, Al Pacino, Rene Russo
Outline: After suffering a career-ending injury, a former college football star aligns himself with one of the most renowned touts in the sports-gambling business.

Name: The Craft
Credit: Dir: Andrew Fleming With: Robin Tunney, Fairuza Balk, Neve Campbell
Outline: A newcomer to a Catholic prep high school falls in with a trio of outcast teenage girls who practice witchcraft and they all soon conjure up various spells and curses against those who even slightly anger them.

Name: The Eagle
Credit: Dir: Kevin Macdonald With: Channing Tatum, Jamie Bell, Donald Sutherland
Outline: In Roman-ruled Britain, a young Roman soldier endeavors to honor his father's memory by finding his lost legion's golden emblem.

Name: Flightplan
Credit: Dir: Robert Schwentke With: Jodie Foster, Peter Sarsgaard, Sean Bean
Outline: A bereaved woman and her daughter are flying home from Berlin to America. At 30,000 feet, the child vanishes, and nobody will admit she was ever on the plane.

Name: Tomorrow, When the War Began
Credit: Dir: Stuart Beattie With: Caitlin Stasey, Rachel Hurd-Wood, Lincoln Lewis
Outline: When their country is invaded and their families are taken, eight unlikely high school teenagers band together to fight.

Name: Orange County
Credit: Dir: Jake Kasdan With: Colin Hanks, Jack Black, Schuyler Fisk
Outline: A guidance counselor mistakenly sends out the wrong transcripts to Stanford University under the name of an over-achieving high schooler.

Name: Solaris
Credit: Dir: Steven Soderbergh With: George Clooney, Natascha McElhone, Ulrich Tukur
Outline: A troubled psychologist is sent to investigate the crew of an isolated research station orbiting a bizarre planet.

Name: Forever Young
Credit: Dir: Steve Miner With: Mel Gibson, Jamie Lee Curtis, Elijah Wood
Outline: During a cryogenics test, a pilot frozen in 1939 awakes in 1992 but time is running out, as his body starts to age rapidly.

Name: Step Up 2: The Streets
Credit: Dir: Jon M. Chu With: Robert Hoffman, Briana Evigan, Cassie Ventura
Outline: Romantic sparks occur between two dance students from different backgrounds at the Maryland School of the Arts.

Name: Redemption
Credit: Dir: Steven Knight With: Jason Statham, Agata Buzek, Vicky McClure
Outline: Homeless and on the run from a military court martial, a damaged ex-special forces soldier navigating London's criminal underworld seizes an opportunity to assume another man's identity -- transforming into an avenging angel in the process.

Name: Rising Sun
Credit: Dir: Philip Kaufman With: Sean Connery, Wesley Snipes, Harvey Keitel
Outline: At the offices of a Japanese corporation, during a party, a woman, who's evidently a professional mistress...

Name: Fever Pitch
Credit: Dir: Bobby Farrelly, Peter Farrelly With: Drew Barrymore, Jimmy Fallon, Jason Spevack
Outline: Lindsay is stuck in the middle of her relationship with Ben and his passion for the Boston Red Sox.

Name: Untraceable
Credit: Dir: Gregory Hoblit With: Diane Lane, Colin Hanks, Joseph Cross
Outline: FBI agent Jennifer Marsh is tasked with hunting down a seemingly untraceable serial killer who posts live videos of his victims on the Internet. As time runs out, the cat and mouse chase becomes more personal.

Name: The Hole
Credit: Dir: Nick Hamm With: Thora Birch, Desmond Harrington, Daniel Brocklebank
Outline: Four teenagers at a British private school secretly uncover and explore the depths of a sealed underground hole created decades ago as a possible bomb shelter.

Name: Step Up 3D
Credit: Dir: Jon M. Chu With: Sharni Vinson, Rick Malambri, Adam G. Sevani
Outline: A tight-knit group of New York City street dancers find themselves pitted against the world's best hip hop dancers in a high-stakes showdown.

Name: The Rum Diary

Name: Lions for Lambs

Outline: Injuries sustained by two Army rangers behind enemy lines in Afghanistan set off a sequence of events involving a congressman, a journalist and a professor.

Name: The Karate Kid

Name: Winter's Tale

Outline: A burglar falls for an heiress as she dies in his arms. When he learns that he has the gift of reincarnation, he sets out to save her.

Name: Rock Star
Credit: Dir: Stephen Herek With: Mark Wahlberg, Jennifer Aniston, Dominic West
Outline: Lead singer of a tribute band becomes lead singer of the real band he idolizes.

Name: The Amityville Horror
Credit: Dir: Stuart Rosenberg With: James Brolin, Margot Kidder, Rod Steiger
Outline: Newlyweds move into a large house where a mass murder was committed, and experience strange manifestations which drive them away.

Name: 3 Days to Kill

Outline: Bi-polar mall security guard Ronnie Barnhardt is called into action to stop a flasher from turning shopper's paradise into his personal peep show. But when Barnhardt can't bring the culprit to justice, a surly police detective, is recruited to close the case.

Name: Daylight
Credit: Dir: Rob Cohen With: Sylvester Stallone, Amy Brenneman, Viggo Mortensen
Outline: Disaster in a New York tunnel as explosions collapse both ends of it. One hero tries to help the people inside find their way to safety.

Name: The Break-Up
Credit: Dir: Peyton Reed With: Jennifer Aniston, Vince Vaughn, Jon Favreau
Outline: In a bid to keep their luxurious condo from their significant other, a couple's break-up proceeds to get uglier and nastier by the moment.

Name: The Fan
Credit: Dir: Tony Scott With: Robert De Niro, Wesley Snipes, Ellen Barkin
Outline: An all star baseball player becomes the unhealthy focus of a down on his luck salesman.

Name: Cocktail
Credit: Dir: Roger Donaldson With: Tom Cruise, Bryan Brown, Elisabeth Shue
Outline: A talented New York City bartender takes a job at a bar in Jamaica and falls in love.

Name: Indecent Proposal
Credit: Dir: Adrian Lyne With: Robert Redford, Demi Moore, Woody Harrelson
Outline: A Millionaire offers a $1,000,000 to a young married lovely couple for a night with the wife.

Name: The Gunman
Credit: Dir: Pierre Morel With: Sean Penn, Idris Elba, Jasmine Trinca
Outline: A sniper on a mercenary assassination team, kills the minister of mines of the Congo. Terrier's successful kill shot forces him into hiding. Returning to the Congo years later, he becomes the target of a hit squad himself.

Name: The Forgotten
Credit: Dir: Joseph Ruben With: Julianne Moore, Dominic West, Christopher Kovaleski
Outline: After being told that their children never existed, a man and woman soon discover there is a much bigger enemy at work.

Name: Another 48 Hrs.
Credit: Dir: Walter Hill With: Eddie Murphy, Nick Nolte, Brion James
Outline: Jack Cates once again enlists the aid of ex-con Reggie Hammond--this time, to take down The Iceman, a ruthless drug lord operating in the San Francisco bay area.

Credit: Dir: Mark Christopher With: Ryan Phillippe, Salma Hayek, Sela Ward
Outline: Famous 70s NYC nightclub seen and told through the eyes of a young employee.

Name: Hard Rain
Credit: Dir: Mikael Salomon With: Morgan Freeman, Christian Slater, Randy Quaid
Outline: In Huntingburg, the armored truck with three million dollars driven by Tom and his Uncle Charlie gets...

Name: Cradle 2 the Grave
Credit: Dir: Andrzej Bartkowiak With: Jet Li, DMX, Mark Dacascos
Outline: A jewel thief's daughter is kidnapped after he steals a collection of prized black diamonds, which aren't at all what they seem.

Name: The Guilt Trip
Credit: Dir: Anne Fletcher With: Barbra Streisand, Seth Rogen, Julene Renee
Outline: As inventor Andy Brewster is about to embark on the road trip of a lifetime, a quick stop at his mom's house turns into an unexpected cross-country voyage with her along for the ride.

Name: Oldboy
Credit: Dir: Spike Lee With: Josh Brolin, Elizabeth Olsen, Samuel L. Jackson
Outline: Obsessed with vengeance, a man sets out to find out why he was kidnapped and locked into solitary confinement for twenty years without reason.

Name: The Paperboy
Credit: Dir: Lee Daniels With: Matthew McConaughey, Nicole Kidman, John Cusack
Outline: A reporter returns to his Florida home-town to investigate a case involving a death row inmate.

Name: Admission
Credit: Dir: Paul Weitz With: Tina Fey, Paul Rudd, Nat Wolff
Outline: A Princeton admissions officer who is up for a major promotion takes a professional risk after she meets a college-bound alternative school kid who just might be the son she gave up years ago in a secret adoption.

Name: Jack
Credit: Dir: Francis Ford Coppola With: Robin Williams, Diane Lane, Brian Kerwin
Outline: Because of an unusual aging disorder that has aged him four times faster than a normal human being, a boy enters the fifth grade for the first time with the appearance of a 40 year old man.

Name: Sabotage
Credit: Dir: David Ayer With: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Sam Worthington, Terrence Howard
Outline: Members of an elite DEA task force find themselves being taken down one by one after they rob a drug cartel safe house.

Name: Only God Forgives
Credit: Dir: Nicolas Winding Refn With: Ryan Gosling, Kristin Scott Thomas, Vithaya Pansringarm
Outline: Julian, a drug-smuggler thriving in Bangkok's criminal underworld, sees his life get even more complicated when his mother compels him to find and kill whoever is responsible for his brother's recent death.

Name: Reindeer Games
Credit: Dir: John Frankenheimer With: Ben Affleck, Gary Sinise, Charlize Theron
Outline: After assuming his dead cellmate's identity to get with his girlfriend, an ex-con finds himself the reluctant participant in a casino heist.

Name: Open Water
Credit: Dir: Chris Kentis With: Blanchard Ryan, Daniel Travis, Saul Stein
Outline: When two divers find themselves stranded in the ocean, getting rescued becomes the least of their worries when a frenzy of hungry sharks close in on them.

Name: Drillbit Taylor
Credit: Dir: Steven Brill With: Owen Wilson, Josh Peck, Alex Frost
Outline: Three kids hire a low-budget bodyguard to protect them from the playground bully.

Name: Magic Mike XXL
Credit: Dir: Gregory Jacobs With: Channing Tatum, Joe Manganiello, Matt Bomer
Outline: Three years after Mike bowed out of the stripper life at the top of his game, he and the remaining Kings of Tampa hit the road to Myrtle Beach to put on one last blow-out performance.

Name: What to Expect When You're Expecting
Credit: Dir: Kirk Jones With: Cameron Diaz, Matthew Morrison, J. Todd Smith
Outline: Follows the lives of five interconnected couples as they experience the thrills and surprises of having a baby, and realize that no matter what you plan for, life does not always deliver what is expected.

Name: Brick Mansions
Credit: Dir: Camille Delamarre With: Paul Walker, David Belle, RZA
Outline: An undercover Detroit cop navigates a dangerous neighborhood that's surrounded by a containment wall with the help of an ex-con in order to bring down a crime lord and his plot to devastate the entire city.

Name: The Blue Lagoon
Credit: Dir: Randal Kleiser With: Brooke Shields, Christopher Atkins, Leo McKern
Outline: In the Victorian period, two children are shipwrecked on a tropical island in the South Pacific. With no adults to guide them, the two make a simple life together, unaware that sexual maturity will eventually intervene.

Name: Eat Pray Love
Credit: Dir: Ryan Murphy With: Julia Roberts, Javier Bardem, Richard Jenkins
Outline: A married woman realizes how unhappy her marriage really is, and that her life needs to go in a different direction. After a painful divorce, she takes off on a round-the-world journey to "find herself".

Name: Paranoia
Credit: Dir: Robert Luketic With: Liam Hemsworth, Gary Oldman, Harrison Ford
Outline: An entry-level employee at a powerful corporation finds himself occupying a corner office, but at a dangerous price: he must spy on his boss's old mentor to secure for him a multi-billion dollar advantage.

Name: Lady in the Water
Credit: Dir: M. Night Shyamalan With: Paul Giamatti, Bryce Dallas Howard, Jeffrey Wright
Outline: Apartment building superintendent Cleveland Heep rescues what he thinks is a young woman from the pool he maintains. When he discovers that she is actually a character from a bedtime story who is trying to make the journey back to her home, he works with his tenants to protect his new friend from the creatures that are determined to keep her in our world.

Name: Four Christmases
Credit: Dir: Seth Gordon With: Reese Witherspoon, Vince Vaughn, Mary Steenburgen
Outline: A couple struggles to visit all four of their divorced parents on Christmas.

Name: Michael
Credit: Dir: Nora Ephron With: John Travolta, Andie MacDowell, William Hurt
Outline: Two tabloid reporters checking out a report of the Archangel Michael living with an old woman find that it's true. But that's not the only surprise.

Name: Drumline
Credit: Dir: Charles Stone III With: Nick Cannon, Zoe Saldana, Orlando Jones
Outline: A band director recruits a Harlem street drummer to play at a Southern university.

Name: Blue Crush
Credit: Dir: John Stockwell With: Kate Bosworth, Michelle Rodriguez, Matthew Davis
Outline: As a hard-core surfer girl prepares for a big competition, she finds herself falling for a football player.

Name: The Last Exorcism
Credit: Dir: Daniel Stamm With: Patrick Fabian, Ashley Bell, Iris Bahr
Outline: A troubled evangelical minister agrees to let his last exorcism be filmed by a documentary crew.

Name: Poseidon
Credit: Dir: Wolfgang Petersen With: Richard Dreyfuss, Kurt Russell, Emmy Rossum
Outline: On New Year's Eve, the luxury ocean liner Poseidon capsizes after being swamped by a rogue wave. The survivors are left to fight for their lives as they attempt to escape the sinking ship.

Name: Over the Top
Credit: Dir: Menahem Golan With: Sylvester Stallone, Robert Loggia, Susan Blakely
Outline: Lincoln Hawk is a trucker and arm wrestler who attempts to reconcile with his estranged son and win the world arm wrestling championship.

Name: Enough
Credit: Dir: Michael Apted With: Jennifer Lopez, Billy Campbell, Tessa Allen
Outline: After running away fails, a terrified woman (Jennifer Lopez) empowers herself in order to battle her abusive husband (Billy Campbell).

Name: Wild Card
Credit: Dir: Simon West With: Jason Statham, Michael Angarano, Dominik GarcÃ­a-Lorido
Outline: When a Las Vegas bodyguard with lethal skills and a gambling problem gets in trouble with the mob, he has one last play...and it's all or nothing.

Name: Coyote Ugly
Credit: Dir: David McNally With: Piper Perabo, Adam Garcia, John Goodman
Outline: Aspiring songwriter Violet Sanford, after getting a job at a women-run NYC bar that teases its male patrons, comes out of her shell.

Name: The Bling Ring
Credit: Dir: Sofia Coppola With: Katie Chang, Israel Broussard, Emma Watson
Outline: Inspired by actual events, a group of fame-obsessed teenagers use the internet to track celebrities' whereabouts in order to rob their homes.

Name: Snakes on a Plane
Credit: Dir: David R. Ellis With: Samuel L. Jackson, Julianna Margulies, Nathan Phillips
Outline: An FBI agent takes on a plane full of deadly and venomous snakes, deliberately released to kill a witness being flown from Honolulu to Los Angeles to testify against a mob boss.

Name: Maggie
Credit: Dir: Henry Hobson With: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Abigail Breslin, Joely Richardson
Outline: A teenage girl in the Midwest becomes infected by an outbreak of a disease that slowly turns the infected into cannibalistic zombies. During her transformation, her loving father stays by her side.

Name: The Skulls
Credit: Dir: Rob Cohen With: Joshua Jackson, Paul Walker, Hill Harper
Outline: Luke McNamara, a college senior from a working class background joins a secret elitist college fraternity organization called "The Skulls"...

Name: Mirror Mirror
Credit: Dir: Tarsem Singh With: Lily Collins, Julia Roberts, Armie Hammer
Outline: An evil queen steals control of a kingdom and an exiled princess enlists the help of seven resourceful rebels to win back her birthright.

Name: The Black Dahlia
Credit: Dir: Brian De Palma With: Josh Hartnett, Aaron Eckhart, Scarlett Johansson
Outline: Two policemen see their personal and professional lives fall apart in the wake of the "Black Dahlia" murder investigation.

Name: Beastly
Credit: Dir: Daniel Barnz With: Alex Pettyfer, Vanessa Hudgens, Mary-Kate Olsen
Outline: A modern-day take on the "Beauty and the Beast" tale where a New York teen is transformed into a hideous monster in order to find true love.

Name: Fighting
Credit: Dir: Dito Montiel With: Channing Tatum, Terrence Howard, Luis GuzmÃ¡n
Outline: In New York City, a young counterfeiter is introduced to the world of underground street fighting by a seasoned scam artist, who becomes his manager on the bare-knuckling brawling circuit.

Name: Money Train
Credit: Dir: Joseph Ruben With: Wesley Snipes, Woody Harrelson, Jennifer Lopez
Outline: A vengeful New York transit cop decides to steal a trainload of subway fares; his foster brother, a fellow cop, tries to protect him.

Name: Pompeii
Credit: Dir: Paul W.S. Anderson With: Kit Harington, Emily Browning, Kiefer Sutherland
Outline: A slave-turned-gladiator finds himself in a race against time to save his true love, who has been betrothed to a corrupt Roman Senator. As Mount Vesuvius erupts, he must fight to save his beloved as Pompeii crumbles around him.

Name: Chain Reaction
Credit: Dir: Andrew Davis With: Keanu Reeves, Morgan Freeman, Rachel Weisz
Outline: Two researchers in a green alternative energy project are put on the run when they are framed for murder and treason.

Name: The Box
Credit: Dir: Richard Kelly With: Cameron Diaz, James Marsden, Frank Langella
Outline: A small wooden box arrives on the doorstep of a married couple, who know that opening it will grant them a million dollars and kill someone they don't know.

Name: Dark Water
Credit: Dir: Walter Salles With: Jennifer Connelly, Ariel Gade, John C. Reilly
Outline: A mother and daughter, still wounded from a bitter custody dispute, hole up in a run-down apartment building. Adding further drama to their plight, they are targeted by the ghost of former resident.

Name: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn - Part 2
Credit: Dir: Bill Condon With: Kristen Stewart, Robert Pattinson, Taylor Lautner
Outline: After the birth of Renesmee, the Cullens gather other vampire clans in order to protect the child from a false allegation that puts the family in front of the Volturi.

Name: Alexander
Genre: Action | Adventure | Biography | Drama | History | Romance | War
Credit: Dir: Oliver Stone With: Colin Farrell, Anthony Hopkins, Rosario Dawson
Outline: Alexander, the King of Macedonia and one of the greatest military leaders in the history of warfare, conquers much of the known world.

Name: The Pacifier
Credit: Dir: Adam Shankman With: Vin Diesel, Brittany Snow, Max Thieriot
Outline: Disgraced Navy SEAL Shane Wolfe is handed a new assignment: Protect the five Plummer kids from enemies of their recently deceased father -- a government scientist whose top-secret experiment remains in the kids' house.

Name: Beethoven
Credit: Dir: Brian Levant With: Charles Grodin, Bonnie Hunt, Dean Jones
Outline: A slobbering St. Bernard becomes the center of attention for a loving family, but its veterinarian secretly wants to kill him.

Name: Exit Wounds
Credit: Dir: Andrzej Bartkowiak With: Steven Seagal, DMX, Isaiah Washington
Outline: Orin Boyd, a tough cop in an inner-city precinct discovers a web of dirty cops and corruption.

Name: Stolen
Credit: Dir: Simon West With: Nicolas Cage, Malin Akerman, Josh Lucas
Outline: A former thief frantically searches for his missing daughter, who has been kidnapped and locked in the trunk of a taxi.

Name: Dreamcatcher
Credit: Dir: Lawrence Kasdan With: Morgan Freeman, Thomas Jane, Jason Lee
Outline: Friends on a camping trip discover that the town they're vacationing in is being plagued in an unusual fashion by parasitic aliens from outer space.

Name: Sex and the City
Credit: Dir: Michael Patrick King With: Sarah Jessica Parker, Kim Cattrall, Cynthia Nixon
Outline: A New York writer on sex and love is finally getting married to her Mr. Big. But her three best girlfriends must console her after one of them inadvertently leads Mr. Big to jilt her.

Name: Rumor Has It...
Credit: Dir: Rob Reiner With: Jennifer Aniston, Mark Ruffalo, Shirley MacLaine
Outline: Sarah Huttinger is a woman who learns that her family was the inspiration for the book and film "The Graduate" -- and that she just might be the offspring of the well-documented event.

Name: White Noise
Credit: Dir: Geoffrey Sax With: Michael Keaton, Deborah Kara Unger, Ian McNeice
Outline: An architect's desire to speak with his wife from beyond the grave, becomes an obsession with supernatural repercussions.

Name: The Day the Earth Stood Still
Credit: Dir: Scott Derrickson With: Keanu Reeves, Jennifer Connelly, Kathy Bates
Outline: A remake of the 1951 classic sci-fi film about an alien visitor and his giant robot counterpart who visit Earth.

Name: Collateral Damage
Credit: Dir: Andrew Davis With: Arnold Schwarzenegger, John Leguizamo, Francesca Neri
Outline: After his family is killed by a terrorist act, a firefighter goes in search of the one responsible.

Name: Aloha
Credit: Dir: Cameron Crowe With: Bradley Cooper, Rachel McAdams, Emma Stone
Outline: A celebrated military contractor returns to the site of his greatest career triumphs and reconnects with a long-ago love while unexpectedly falling for the hard-charging Air Force watch-dog assigned to him.

Name: The Specialist
Credit: Dir: Luis Llosa With: Sylvester Stallone, Sharon Stone, James Woods
Outline: A woman entices a bomb expert she's involved with into destroying the mafia that killed her family.

Name: Killing Season
Credit: Dir: Mark Steven Johnson With: Robert De Niro, John Travolta, Milo Ventimiglia
Outline: Two veterans of the Bosnian War - one American, one Serbian - find their unlikely friendship tested when one of them reveals their true intentions.

Name: Tusk
Credit: Dir: Kevin Smith With: Justin Long, Michael Parks, Haley Joel Osment
Outline: When podcaster Wallace Bryton goes missing in the backwoods of Manitoba while interviewing a mysterious seafarer named Howard Howe, his best friend Teddy and girlfriend Allison team with an ex-cop to look for him.

Name: Volcano
Credit: Dir: Mick Jackson With: Tommy Lee Jones, Anne Heche, Gaby Hoffmann
Outline: A volcano erupts in downtown L.A., threatening to destroy the city.

Name: Stone
Credit: Dir: John Curran With: Edward Norton, Milla Jovovich, Robert De Niro
Outline: A convicted arsonist looks to manipulate a parole officer into a plan to secure his parole by placing his beautiful wife in the lawman's path.

Name: The Messengers
Credit: Dir: Danny Pang, Oxide Chun Pang With: Dylan McDermott, Penelope Ann Miller, Kristen Stewart
Outline: An ominous darkness invades a seemingly serene sunflower farm in North Dakota, and the Solomon family is torn apart by suspicion, mayhem and murder.

Name: Pathfinder
Credit: Dir: Marcus Nispel With: Karl Urban, Clancy Brown, Moon Bloodgood
Outline: A Viking boy is left behind after his clan battles a Native American tribe. Raised within the tribe, he ultimately becomes their savior in a fight against the Norsemen.

Name: Blackhat
Credit: Dir: Michael Mann With: Chris Hemsworth, Viola Davis, Wei Tang
Outline: A furloughed convict and his American and Chinese partners hunt a high-level cybercrime network from Chicago to Los Angeles to Hong Kong to Jakarta.

Name: Max Payne
Credit: Dir: John Moore With: Mark Wahlberg, Mila Kunis, Beau Bridges
Outline: Coming together to solve a series of murders in New York City are a police detective whose family was slain as part of a conspiracy and an assassin out to avenge her sister's death. The duo will be hunted by the police, the mob, and a ruthless corporation.

Name: The Counselor
Credit: Dir: Ridley Scott With: Michael Fassbender, PenÃ©lope Cruz, Cameron Diaz
Outline: A lawyer finds himself in over his head when he gets involved in drug trafficking.

Name: How Do You Know
Credit: Dir: James L. Brooks With: Reese Witherspoon, Paul Rudd, Owen Wilson
Outline: After being cut from the USA softball team and feeling a bit past her prime, Lisa finds herself evaluating her life and in the middle of a love triangle, as a corporate guy in crisis competes with her current, baseball-playing beau.

Name: The Astronaut's Wife
Credit: Dir: Rand Ravich With: Charlize Theron, Johnny Depp, Joe Morton
Outline: After an explosion in space and subsequent two-minute radio-out period, two astronauts return home to their wives. Slightly it's revealed that they're not the same as they were.

Name: Trespass
Credit: Dir: Joel Schumacher With: Nicolas Cage, Nicole Kidman, Cam Gigandet
Outline: As they're held for ransom, a husband and wife's predicament grows more dire amid the discovery of betrayal and deception.

Name: The Dilemma
Credit: Dir: Ron Howard With: Vince Vaughn, Kevin James, Winona Ryder
Outline: A man discovers that his best friend's wife is having an affair.

Name: Spring Breakers
Credit: Dir: Harmony Korine With: Vanessa Hudgens, Selena Gomez, Ashley Benson
Outline: Four college girls hold up a restaurant in order to fund their spring break vacation. While partying/drinking/taking drugs they are arrested only to be bailed out by a drug and arms dealer.

Name: Sleeping Beauty
Credit: Dir: Julia Leigh With: Emily Browning, Rachael Blake, Ewen Leslie
Outline: A haunting portrait of Lucy, a young university student drawn into a mysterious hidden world of unspoken desires.

Name: Honey
Credit: Dir: Bille Woodruff With: Jessica Alba, Mekhi Phifer, Romeo Miller
Outline: Honey is a sexy, tough music video choreographer who shakes up her life after her mentor gives her an ultimatum: sleep with him or be blacklisted within their industry.

Name: Caligula
Credit: Dir: Tinto Brass With: Malcolm McDowell, Peter O'Toole, Helen Mirren
Outline: Details the graphic and shocking, yet undeniably tragic story of Rome's most infamous Caesar, Gaius Germanicus Caligula.

Name: A Serbian Film
Credit: Dir: Srdjan Spasojevic With: Srdjan Todorovic, Sergej Trifunovic, Jelena Gavrilovic
Outline: An aging porn star agrees to participate in an "art film" in order to make a clean break from the business, only to discover that he has been drafted into making a pedophilia and necrophilia themed snuff film.

Name: Queen of the Damned
Credit: Dir: Michael Rymer With: Aaliyah, Stuart Townsend, Marguerite Moreau
Outline: The vampire Lestat becomes a rock star whose music wakes up the queen of all vampires.

Name: Twilight
Credit: Dir: Catherine Hardwicke With: Kristen Stewart, Robert Pattinson, Billy Burke
Outline: A teenage girl risks everything when she falls in love with a vampire.

Name: Rocky V
Credit: Dir: John G. Avildsen With: Sylvester Stallone, Talia Shire, Burt Young
Outline: Reluctantly retired from boxing and back from riches to rags, Rocky takes on a new protege who betrays him; As the champ's son must adjust to his family's new life after bankruptcy.

Name: Get Carter
Credit: Dir: Stephen Kay With: Sylvester Stallone, Rachael Leigh Cook, Miranda Richardson
Outline: Years ago, Jack Carter left his Seattle home to become a Las Vegas mob casino financial enforcer. He...

Name: 10,000 BC
Credit: Dir: Roland Emmerich With: Camilla Belle, Steven Strait, Marco Khan
Outline: A prehistoric epic that follows a young mammoth hunter's journey through uncharted territory to secure the future of his tribe.

Name: Maid in Manhattan
Credit: Dir: Wayne Wang With: Jennifer Lopez, Ralph Fiennes, Natasha Richardson
Outline: A senatorial candidate falls for a hotel maid, thinking she is a socialite when he sees her trying on a wealthy woman's dress.

Name: Cosmopolis
Credit: Dir: David Cronenberg With: Robert Pattinson, Juliette Binoche, Sarah Gadon
Outline: Riding across Manhattan in a stretch limo in order to get a haircut, a 28-year-old billionaire asset manager's day devolves into an odyssey with a cast of characters that start to tear his world apart.

Name: Get Rich or Die Tryin'
Credit: Dir: Jim Sheridan With: 50 Cent, Joy Bryant, Adewale Akinnuoye-Agbaje
Outline: A tale of an inner city drug dealer who turns away from crime to pursue his passion, rap music.

Name: Toys
Credit: Dir: Barry Levinson With: Robin Williams, Michael Gambon, Joan Cusack
Outline: When a military general inherits a toy making company and begins making war toys, his employees band together to stop him before he ruins the name of Zevo Toys forever.

Name: The Karate Kid, Part III
Credit: Dir: John G. Avildsen With: Ralph Macchio, Pat Morita, Robyn Lively
Outline: Ostracised villain John Kreese attempts to gain revenge on Daniel and Miyagi, with the help of a Vietnam War comrade, the wealthy owner of a toxic waste disposal business.

Name: The Twilight Saga: Eclipse
Credit: Dir: David Slade With: Kristen Stewart, Robert Pattinson, Taylor Lautner
Outline: As a string of mysterious killings grips Seattle, Bella, whose high school graduation is fast approaching, is forced to choose between her love for vampire Edward and her friendship with werewolf Jacob.

Name: God's Not Dead
Credit: Dir: Harold Cronk With: Shane Harper, Kevin Sorbo, David A.R. White
Outline: College philosophy professor Mr. Radisson's curriculum is challenged by his new student, Josh, who believes God exists.

Name: The Darkest Hour
Credit: Dir: Chris Gorak With: Emile Hirsch, Olivia Thirlby, Max Minghella
Outline: In Moscow, five young people lead the charge against an alien race who have attacked Earth via our power supply.

Name: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn - Part 1
Credit: Dir: Bill Condon With: Kristen Stewart, Robert Pattinson, Taylor Lautner
Outline: The Quileutes close in on expecting parents Edward and Bella, whose unborn child poses a threat to the Wolf Pack and the towns people of Forks.

Name: The Roommate
Credit: Dir: Christian E. Christiansen With: Minka Kelly, Leighton Meester, Cam Gigandet
Outline: When college freshman Sara arrives on campus for the first time, she befriends her roommate, Rebecca, unaware that the girl is becoming dangerously obsessed with her.

Name: The Unborn
Credit: Dir: David S. Goyer With: Odette Annable, Gary Oldman, Cam Gigandet
Outline: A young woman fights the spirit that is slowly taking possession of her.

Name: Did You Hear About the Morgans?
Credit: Dir: Marc Lawrence With: Hugh Grant, Sarah Jessica Parker, Sam Elliott
Outline: In New York City, an estranged couple who witness a murder are relocated to small-town Wyoming as part of a witness-protection program.

Name: The Marine
Credit: Dir: John Bonito With: John Cena, Kelly Carlson, Robert Patrick
Outline: A group of diamond thieves on the run kidnap the wife of a recently discharged marine who goes on a chase through the South Carolinian wilderness to retrieve her.

Name: Jonah Hex
Credit: Dir: Jimmy Hayward With: Josh Brolin, Megan Fox, John Malkovich
Outline: The U.S. military makes a scarred bounty hunter with warrants on his own head an offer he cannot refuse: in exchange for his freedom, he must stop a terrorist who is ready to unleash Hell on Earth.

Name: The Twilight Saga: New Moon
Credit: Dir: Chris Weitz With: Kristen Stewart, Robert Pattinson, Taylor Lautner
Outline: Edward leaves Bella after an attack that nearly claimed her life, and in her depression she falls into yet another paranormal relationship- this time with werewolf Jacob Black.

Name: Showgirls

Outline: A young drifter, named Nomi, arrives in Las Vegas to become a dancer and soon sets about clawing and pushing her way to become the top of the Vegas showgirls.

Name: Driven

Outline: A young hot shot driver is in the middle of a championship season and is coming apart at the seams. A former CART champion is called in to give him guidance.

Name: High School Musical 3: Senior Year
Genre: Comedy | Drama | Family | Music | Musical | Romance
Credit: Dir: Kenny Ortega With: Zac Efron, Vanessa Hudgens, Ashley Tisdale
Outline: As seniors in high school, Troy and Gabriella struggle with the idea of being separated from one another as college approaches. Along with the rest of the Wildcats, they stage a spring musical to address their experiences, hopes and fears about their future.

Name: In the Land of Blood and Honey

Outline: During the Bosnian War, Danijel, a soldier fighting for the Serbs, re-encounters Ajla, a Bosnian who's now a captive in his camp he oversees. Their once promising connection has become ambiguous as their motives have changed.

Name: Striptease
Credit: Dir: Andrew Bergman With: Demi Moore, Burt Reynolds, Armand Assante
Outline: A stripper and single mother gets dragged into a dangerous situation after a congressman takes a fancy to her.

Name: Sex and the City 2
Credit: Dir: Michael Patrick King With: Sarah Jessica Parker, Kim Cattrall, Kristin Davis
Outline: While wrestling with the pressures of life, love, and work in Manhattan, Carrie, Miranda, and Charlotte join Samantha for a trip to Abu Dhabi (United Arab Emirates), where Samantha's ex is filming a new movie.

Name: LOL

Outline: As a new year at school begins, Lola's heart is broken by her boyfriend, though soon she's surprised by her best friend, promising musician Kyle, who reveals his feelings for her.

Name: Grease 2
Credit: Dir: Patricia Birch With: Michelle Pfeiffer, Maxwell Caulfield, Lorna Luft
Outline: An English student at a 1960's American high school has to prove himself to the leader of a girls' gang whose members can only date greasers.

Name: Hannah Montana: The Movie

Outline: As Hannah Montana's popularity begins to take over her life, Miley Stewart, on the urging from her father takes a trip to her hometown of Crowley Corners, Tennessee to get some perspective on what matters in life the most.

Name: Boogeyman
Credit: Dir: Stephen Kay With: Barry Watson, Emily Deschanel, Lucy Lawless
Outline: A young man tries to deal with the childhood terror that has affected his life.

Name: Fifty Shades of Grey
Credit: Dir: Sam Taylor-Johnson With: Dakota Johnson, Jamie Dornan, Jennifer Ehle
Outline: Literature student Anastasia Steele's life changes forever when she meets handsome, yet tormented, billionaire Christian Grey.

Name: Norbit
Credit: Dir: Brian Robbins With: Eddie Murphy, Thandie Newton, Terry Crews
Outline: A mild-mannered guy, who is engaged to a monstrous woman, meets the woman of his dreams, and schemes to find a way to be with her.

Name: The Room
Credit: Dir: Tommy Wiseau With: Tommy Wiseau, Juliette Danielle, Greg Sestero

Name: Crossroads
Credit: Dir: Tamra Davis With: Britney Spears, Anson Mount, Zoe Saldana
Outline: Three childhood best friends, and a guy they just met, take a road trip across the country, finding themselves and their friendship in the process.

Name: Gunday
Credit: Dir: Ali Abbas Zafar With: Ranveer Singh, Arjun Kapoor, Priyanka Chopra
Outline: Two childhood friends travel from Bangladesh to Calcutta during the turbulent 1970s, becoming criminal superstars who both fall for a cabaret dancer.
